black, gone.

Sep 27, 2014 â€¢ aloneindecember

Your pictures are gone,
and so is my love,
my friendship, my willingness.
And so are all my failed efforts to evolve.
gone, gone, gone!

The empty spaces are still there,
they will never be filled,
not with something else,
not the same way,
I don’t care, I have lived, loved and learned.

The sorrow is gone, my memory flakes,
soon this will be dead, buried in my head.
I ain’t wearing black.
